cves.description: A sensitive  information exposure vulnerability in System Information Reporter (SIR) 1.0.3 and prior allows an authenticated non-admin local user to extract sensitive information stored in a registry backup folder.
problemType: CWE-530: Exposure of Backup File to an Unauthorized Control Sphere

cves.description: A path or symbolic link manipulation vulnerability in SIR 1.0.3 and prior versions allows an authenticated non-admin local user to overwrite system files with SIR backup files, which can potentially cause a system crash. This was achieved by adding a malicious entry to the registry under the Trellix SIR registry folder or via policy or with a junction symbolic link to files that the user would not normally have permission to acces
problemType: CWE-59 Improper Link Resolution Before File Access ('Link Following')
